headline: Recounting Fiery Crash Of Rockets At U.S. Base
abstract: United States military personnel recount what it was like when Iranian missiles hit their base last week.
lead_paragraph: AYN AL ASAD AIR BASE, Iraq â€” The first of several Iranian missiles to hit the American military base rammed into the airstrip, nearly destroying a guard tower where two young army specialists were on watch duty. Another crashed next to a dining hall and destroyed part of a building where some drone operators were still working.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
